<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Selket (Mistress of the Beautiful House)](/Deities.aspx?ID=59)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Avenge the wronged, protect the dead and the vulnerable, use poison and suffocation, heal others

**Anathema** Poison someone you didn't intend to, harm a creature as punishment for a different creature’s crime, desecrate a corpse

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)

- **6th**
[Purple Worm Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=242)

</column>
name: Selket (Mistress of the Beautiful House)
